views.markdown:
Designed for iOS 11, 12 and 13

Cut down the space below the tab bar where the home gesture bar sits. The home bar is hidden to allow legibility of the tab bar.

Configure options from Settings.

Coffee fund -

- iOS 13 support Fix for Preferences on A12
A12 support
- Shrink keyboard off by default


- iOS 12 support
- Added option to shrink keyboard
- Added toggle for hiding home bar in preferences - Added preferences with ability to blacklist specific apps


iOS 11 support - Fixed bug with EmojiSuggest
- Optimised code
- Support for upcoming tweak EmojiSuggest
- Fixes for preferences page
- Fix crash when selecting predicted word 1.2.0 changes:
- Removed MorePredict dependency
- Added new shortcuts - select word, undo and redo
- Added ability to enable/disable each shortcut
- Added ability to have different buttons if selecting text
- Shortcuts now have customisable strings i.e. any language you like
- Changes in settings are now updated in real-time
- Attempted to fix crashes
- Added option to use italic text instead of emojis
- Added option to only appear when selecting text
- Reworked paste function to fix crashes
- Fixed prediction bar showing only two suggestions
- Added SelectAll button (Install MorePredict by PoomSmart and change number of cells to 4)
